testcase.name: POST Sync Connector Containers|Poll & Verify Backup Completion
testcase.classname: I am testing POST API request of three different Scenarios

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"gender":"male","last_name":"Bapatla","salary":"20LPA","first_name":"Ravindra","email":"johnravi@gmail.com"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/json.", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

testcase.error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to encode {"gender":"male","last_name":"Bapatla","salary":"20LPA","first_name":"Ravindra","email":"johnravi@gmail.com"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/json.", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

@Post Feature: I am testing POST API request of three different Scenarios
@Post @sree2 Scenario: POST Sync Connector Containers|Poll & Verify Backup Completion # MockLabFeatures/PostRequest.feature:5 Base Uri is : http://dummy.restapiexample.com/ Given I Set POST Connector endpoint as "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/" # PostRequest.i_Set_POST_Connector_endpoint_as(String) Header as : {Content-Type=application/json.} Body as : {"gender":"male","last_name":"Bapatla","salary":"20LPA","first_name":"Ravindra","email":"johnravi@gmail.com"} When I Send a POST HTTP request with request body & HEADER as "application/json." of endpoint as "api/v1/create" # PostRequest.i_Send_a_POST_HTTP_request_with_request_body_HEADER_as_of_endpoint_as(String,String) java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to encode {"gender":"male","last_name":"Bapatla","salary":"20LPA","first_name":"Ravindra","email":"johnravi@gmail.com"} as a byte stream.
